=== Reimaging ===
Arcos Dorados has been updating its McDonald's restaurants throughout the region. Between 2010 and 2012, more than 260 restaurants were fully renovated  with larger gathering areas, warmer colors, contemporary furniture, artwork, large windows allowing more natural light and often have outdoor space with tables and umbrellas for outdoor dining.
